short.zh_CN: 下班提醒：👻一个贴心的桌面幽灵！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[UPDATE] Personalize your ghost!
Want to change the spooky ghost image? Click the plugin icon, upload your own GIF (under 2MB), save, and open a new tab (or refresh your old tabs). Your new ghost will appear!


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Once a poor, overworked soul, Casper now haunts the digital realm as a friendly neighborhood ghost. All he remembers from his mortal life is the importance of clocking out on time. Now, he's dedicated to helping others avoid his fate.

Tired of seeing people burn the midnight oil? Casper's Chrome extension is here to save the day! Set your desired clock-out time, and Casper will send you a friendly reminder to wrap up and go home.

***Don't be a Casper!***
Download now and join the clock-out revolution.
long.zh_CN:
【更新】现在你可以自定义幽灵形象啦！
点击插件图标，上传你喜欢的 GIF 图片（小于 2MB），保存，新开页面或刷新旧页面，你的专属幽灵就会出现啦。


----------------------------------------------------------------------------

曾经，Casper是个苦逼社畜，天天加班到深夜，结果一不小心就变鬼啦！作为一只善良的幽灵，他决定帮助大家避免重蹈覆辙。

Casper的Chrome插件就是你的下班神器！设定好你的下班时间，Casper就会温馨提醒你该回家啦！

别变成下一个Casper！赶快下载，准点下班、享受生活吧！
